Edges-Leadership -- Female Hearth Elf Heroic Adventurer
Attributes (10 Points):
Agility: d10 Smarts: d10 Spirit: d8 Strength: d6 Vigor: d8
Attribute Notes:
Agile: +1 Agility step
Death Before Dishonor: +2 Spirit (mass battle morale)
Skills (21 Points):
Fighting: (agi) d8 Intimidation: (spi) d4 Repair: (sma) d4-2
Gambling: (sma) d4 Knowledge (Battle): (sma) d10 Shooting: (agi) d8
Healing: (sma) d4 Persuasion: (spi) d6-2 Throwing: (agi) d8
Skill Notes:
All Thumbs: -2 Repair/Roll of 1 breaks device
Charisma: -2 Persuasion/-2 Streetwise
Mean: -2 Charisma
Black Sheep: -2 Charisma (heahwisards)
Size: 0 Deity: Kenaz
Advances: 12 Improvement Points: 27 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 10; Edge: 8; Skill: 9
Features
Edges (4 points): A Few Good Men; Command Presence; Command; Coordinated Firepower; Cry Havoc!; Death Before Dishonor; Fanaticism; Fervor; Hold The Line!; Inspire; Siege Breaker; Siege Mentality Hindrances: Black Sheep; Mean; Stubborn Hearth Elf Features: Agile; All Thumbs; Forest-Born; Low Light Vision; Natural Realms
Feature Notes:
Command Presence: Increased Command effects
Inspire: Increased Command effects
Black Sheep: Ostracized by magocratic nobility
Command: R10" Commanded +2 to recover from Shaken or Stunned
Low Light Vision: Ignores penalties for dim and dark illumination
Mean: Ill-tempered and disagreeable
Natural Realms: Treats Elfhomes as wilds
Stubborn: Never admits error
Combat
Parry: 6 (0) Cover: 0 Toughness: 6 (0) Pace/Run: 6/+d6
Armor: None Shield: None Weapons: Unarmed: 1 (d6+d0)
Combat Notes:
Fighting Parry Modifier: +4 Parry
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +4
A Few Good Men: Adds one token to army in mass battles
Coordinated Firepower: R10" Commanded extras fire at single foe simultaneously at +2, doing cumulative damage
Cry Havoc!: Can charge during Battle roll 1/mass battle, success removes 1 foe token
Fanaticism: R10" Commanded +2 vs fear, -2 fear table
Fervor: R10" Commanded +1 Fighting damage
Forest-Born: No difficult terrain penalty in forests
Hold The Line!: R10" Commanded +1 Toughness
Siege Breaker: -1 fortification siege bonus during mass battle, test Knowledge (Battle) for -2 (Raise -3)
Siege Mentality: +1 fortification siege bonus during mass battle, test Knowledge (Battle) for +2 (Raise +3)
Notes
Validation Errors: Edge Allocation: 4 available vs. 12 allocated
